5.4 SmolVLA
With VLAs in the early stage of development compared to more mature LLMs and VLMs, much of the progress
made on VLAs remains proprietary, with many releases exclusively sharing the weights while withholding the data
used, full experimental details and essential methodological components of training.
child_f3c4f7e0b0c84c6eab4a5d7f9854cb5a.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_0e979f14d07e4a0c8358235fc42d8063.content:
In constrast with this closed
approach, SmolVLA (Shukor et al., 2025) is an entirely open-source research effort, which aims at democratizing
the developments of robotics foundation models by open sourcing the model alongside the data used as well as the
training recipes.
child_0e979f14d07e4a0c8358235fc42d8063.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_cc6f2c3f5a9040b0a8a63cd9b399ad54.content: While encouraging efforts like π0 (Black et al., 2024) demonstrate
child_cc6f2c3f5a9040b0a8a63cd9b399ad54.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_f35c8fdba5c1448d9b44e218fdb485f5.content:
as well as the
training recipes.
child_f35c8fdba5c1448d9b44e218fdb485f5.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_451119e076cd4025986f39202a37ca9b.content:
While encouraging efforts like π0 (Black et al., 2024) demonstrate the feasibility of open VLA systems, they remain
(1) large and compute-intensive and (2) dependent on closed datasets collected via centralized efforts on costly robotic
platforms, which ultimately hinders the accessibility of the method altogether.
child_451119e076cd4025986f39202a37ca9b.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_ff9e8951be3544aea9bf65e3c4ddc2cb.content:
SmolVLA mitigates both these issues
by (1) prioritizing a compact, compute-efficient VLA design and (2) targeting community-contributed datasets on

64



accessible robotic platforms such as the SO-100 and SO-101 arms.
child_ff9e8951be3544aea9bf65e3c4ddc2cb.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_a5fe1ff2df9c489196adcb8e63151786.content:
Similarly to π0, SmolVLA (Figure 39) employs
a MoE architecture combining a pretrained VLM backbone with a dedicated action expert, and trains with flow
matching.
child_a5fe1ff2df9c489196adcb8e63151786.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_3e37188b69d54ce19a5f2bf27ce12ae8.content:
To ensure efficiency and accessibility, SmolVLA adopts SmolVLM-2 (Marafioti et al., 2025) as its VLM
backbone, considering SmolVLM-2’s reduced size and capability to process multiple image inputs alongside text items.
child_3e37188b69d54ce19a5f2bf27ce12ae8.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_10134131085f4dada4f78288ed9ea472.content: SmolVLM-2 uses SigLIP (Zhai et al., 2023) as vis
child_10134131085f4dada4f78288ed9ea472.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_4b0af0081f4d4528af27ec06a9b08ab2.content: process multiple image inputs alongside text items.
child_4b0af0081f4d4528af27ec06a9b08ab2.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_967ab4f81c5644a6bf8ad13b16d7457e.content:
SmolVLM-2 uses SigLIP (Zhai et al., 2023) as vision encoder, producing visual features for a SmolLM2 language
decoder (Allal et al., 2025).
child_967ab4f81c5644a6bf8ad13b16d7457e.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_c9195a8d855e4c1293799d96bf042f2e.content:
Further, SmolVLA adopts a smaller action expert consisting of ∼100M parameters and
an interleaved stack of self and cross-attention layers.
child_c9195a8d855e4c1293799d96bf042f2e.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_bc5d4ca6791443ad8de50b2af0650c60.content:
To improve efficiency, the action expert adopts a reduced
embedding dimension compared to the VLM backbone, resulting in dv = 0.75dVLM.
child_bc5d4ca6791443ad8de50b2af0650c60.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_4ce8574261844babbe8ec6851e24fcff.content:
(2025)’s design

θ

choices thus result in a much smaller size model compared to π0, consisting of ca.
child_4ce8574261844babbe8ec6851e24fcff.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_0fff50a568994985aff68c221efe56ad.content:
In practice, SmolVLA consumes multi-view RGB images, a natural-language instruction, and projected sensorimotor
state token as inputs, together with the noised action chunk ãt:t+Ha the action expert vθ is trained to denoise.
child_0fff50a568994985aff68c221efe56ad.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_13b790e1243248b0a417d9b01822d819.content:
The
robot proprioperceptive states are projected to a shared token space with the VLM to match dVLM, and successively
projected into the expert’
child_13b790e1243248b0a417d9b01822d819.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_1946a35011074f8f8bb3c810ab9ad0af.content:
cted to a shared token space with the VLM to match dVLM, and successively
projected into the expert’s token space.
child_1946a35011074f8f8bb3c810ab9ad0af.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_a6459fe3eee447d9b91660d0a0a50fd7.content:
Similarily to π0, SmolVLA adopts separate experts communicating exclusively
through self-attention layers, which however do not employ blockwise causal attention masking and rather favour
simple causal masking.
child_a6459fe3eee447d9b91660d0a0a50fd7.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_ac6ea683cae3445698b4ea8f40f9abe6.content:
In contrast with π0, the action expert interleaves cross-attention (CA) and self-attention (SA) layers, a choice shown
to yield higher success and smoother action chunks in practice.
child_ac6ea683cae3445698b4ea8f40f9abe6.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_52337a0eeffc4deeb34909571060d6fe.content:
While in the expert SA layers tokens are used to
obtain queries, keys and values, CA layers use action tokens only as queries, and instead project visual, language
and proprioperceptive tokens from the VLM backbone to a shared embedding space to then obtain keys and values.
child_52337a0eeffc4deeb34909571060d6fe.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_b98360169dad4e3abe7674b40c46bba1.content: Notably, keys and values can be cached here as well, resulting in performance gains at inference time.
child_b98360169dad4e3abe7674b40c46bba1.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_b8ac7366bbce428bab8c1b8ff49f4ae0.content: SmolVLA also trims down both token and layer compute.
child_b8ac7366bbce428bab8c1b8ff49f4ae0.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_75c5e8a3d22f4bd78d2f0c314256a0bd.content:
First, it reduces visual tokens via pixel shuffling to a
fi
child_75c5e8a3d22f4bd78d2f0c314256a0bd.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_ea4f1fa385a84affa37dbe51c15d8c8a.content: trims down both token and layer compute.
child_ea4f1fa385a84affa37dbe51c15d8c8a.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_e3333808f23e4dd18dbac92bd8539e10.content:
First, it reduces visual tokens via pixel shuffling to a
fixed budget of 64 tokens per frame, foregoing the tiling used during VLM pretraining for the sake of runtime
efficiency.
child_e3333808f23e4dd18dbac92bd8539e10.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_b8f4af44529949ee9e20a34e0b90eb10.content:
Second, it skips upper VLM layers, as only features from the first N decoder layers, with N = L/2, are
consumed, which provides a good speed-performance trade-off and effectively halves compute needs for the larger
part of SmolVLA.
child_b8f4af44529949ee9e20a34e0b90eb10.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_14790dd1cc3e487c8d0bd894235f29ad.content:
Beyond model compactness, SmolVLA also contributes an inference stack that decouples action
prediction from execution for responsiveness on modest hardware (Section 4.4).
child_14790dd1cc3e487c8d0bd894235f29ad.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_8c48310bea454eda9b3d338bf4266312.content:
Departing from reliance on proprietary datasets, SmolVLA pretrains exclusively on 450+ community datasets, totaling
20k+ trajectories.
child_8c48310bea454eda9b3d338bf4266312.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_7918897296604adba09d009cba870f8f.content:
Because instructions in community contributed dataset can be noisy or missing, the authors
re-annotate tasks with a small off-the-shelf VLM using frames sampled from the dataset, and standardize camera
viewpoints by mapping sources to a consi
child_7918897296604adba09d009cba870f8f.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_a32abec38b6e48429a3375755ee557e1.content:
ing frames sampled from the dataset, and standardize camera
viewpoints by mapping sources to a consistent top/wrist/side ordering.
child_a32abec38b6e48429a3375755ee557e1.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_79cf2ec991ce4a21bafc2e87bb3cbc30.content:
At test time, similarily to π0, SmolVLA
forward-integrates flow over 10 steps, resulting in fast inference.
child_79cf2ec991ce4a21bafc2e87bb3cbc30.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_a127c5c7066f41f1bd22c7fed5ad94c8.content:
SmolVLA proves effective across a range of both real-
world and simulated environments, rivaling π0 while being close to 40% faster and consuming 6x less memory (Shukor
et al., 2025).
child_a127c5c7066f41f1bd22c7fed5ad94c8.title: ROBOT LEARNING

6 Conclusions
This tutorial has charted the paradigmatic shift transforming robotics, tracing the evolution of robotics from
structured, model-based methods to the dynamic, data-driven approaches that define modern robot learning.
child_f8935a5711944eb1a9a8abbb7b1ea12b.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_290487ea6a5b4e0c995bd3d7ce36e7a2.content:
We
began by examining the limitations of traditional dynamics-based control, namely its brittleness and significant
engineering overhead, which motivate the adop
child_290487ea6a5b4e0c995bd3d7ce36e7a2.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_12761667c29648b08c7ac57c90578cdf.content:
-based control, namely its brittleness and significant
engineering overhead, which motivate the adoption of more flexible, learning-based alternatives.
child_12761667c29648b08c7ac57c90578cdf.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_c2d40b8849604901bb52c6cdd97b1c05.content:
Unlike scalable,
data-driven techniques, conventional explicit models demand extensive human expertise, hindering wider accessibility
and scalability of robotics.
child_c2d40b8849604901bb52c6cdd97b1c05.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_0cbf11f342d64fed9fcc996db2897336.content: Our exploration traced a clear trajectory of progress, beginning with Reinforcement Learning (RL).
child_0cbf11f342d64fed9fcc996db2897336.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_6346dbb31f6d484da56ab9e7c12ca8b4.content:
While RL offers
a powerful paradigm for learning through interaction, its application in robotics is complicated by challenges such
as sample inefficiency, safety concerns in real-world training, and the complexities of reward design.
child_6346dbb31f6d484da56ab9e7c12ca8b4.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_2c562cd779a34cc08059bb932d6da02f.content:
We saw how
modern approaches like HIL-SERL make real-world RL more feasible by incorporating training-time human guidance,
datasets of previously collected data as well as learned reward classifiers.
child_2c562cd779a34cc08059bb932d6da02f.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_99845b69ebe6441d98220e36bd81b686.content:
Nonetheless, the inherent difficulties of RL increasingly motivate approaches based on imitation learning, capable to
safely learns from limited number
child_99845b69ebe6441d98220e36bd81b686.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_cb2fa0c17f444de8b8adccdcba592043.content:
singly motivate approaches based on imitation learning, capable to
safely learns from limited numbers of real-world, reward-free expert demonstrations.
child_cb2fa0c17f444de8b8adccdcba592043.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_96b0c9a8eec3416cb3be8e6b8d3f31fb.content:
In turn, the wider adoption of
imitation learning led to the development of single-task policies, where advanced Behavioral Cloning techniques—
implemented as state-conditioned generative models like Action Chunking with Transformers and Diffusion Policy—have
demonstrated the ability to learn complex, multimodal behaviors from human demonstrations.
child_96b0c9a8eec3416cb3be8e6b8d3f31fb.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_46299d147dad423dbfdd0a967a9b5d41.content:
These advancements
laid the groundwork for the current frontier: generalist, language-conditioned Vision-Language-Action models capable
to perform few- and zero-shot a variety of different real-world tasks.
child_46299d147dad423dbfdd0a967a9b5d41.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_38646e518c444493bbec5eb1ce5b68b1.content:
By leveraging powerful pre-trained backbones
and sophisticated generative methods like flow matching, models such as π0 and SmolVLA represent a significant leap
towards foundational models for robotics capable of generalizing across diverse tasks, and even robot embodiments.
child_38646e518c444493bbec5eb1ce5b68b1.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_54d740b339234edabc48f7c864fef319.content: or robotics capable of generalizing across diverse tasks, and even robot embodiments.
child_54d740b339234edabc48f7c864fef319.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_89691bc8c17e4e2b8a0a85a5a8c57553.content: A central theme of this work is the critical role of openness in accelerating this progress.
child_89691bc8c17e4e2b8a0a85a5a8c57553.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_afc129cd6f174237a22dfc4029353e92.content:
The recent explosion in
capability is inseparable from the advent of large-scale, openly available datasets, standardized, stable and accessible
model architectures, and accessible, open-source software like lerobot.
child_afc129cd6f174237a22dfc4029353e92.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_b1615ab6802a41538cb2916b4d7906be.content:
We argue this convergence on open-source
robotics is not a mere trend but a fundamental enabler, democratizing access to research and unlocking the potential
of large, decentralized efforts to advance the field.
child_b1615ab6802a41538cb2916b4d7906be.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_790a4e3346934ec1a5c0829ca1d1b987.content:
The journey detailed in this tutorial, from first principles to the state-of-the-art, aims to equip researchers and
practitioners with the context and tools to begin their own explorations in open-source robot learning.
child_790a4e3346934ec1a5c0829ca1d1b987.title: ROBOT LEARNING

child_b57c8b5131bf4825baada7edb286c6f9.content: Spinning up in deep reinforcement learning.
child_b57c8b5131bf4825baada7edb286c6f9.title: ROBOT LEARNING

QuestiOns fOr the Opening vignette
 1.
child_d7c8138d409740f2bb0f115eb3c2d68f.title: unit2ii

child_1f19edfd25804fe5ad1a3f59105df035.content:
Why should retailers, especially omni-channel retailers, pay extra attention to 
advanced analytics and data mining?
child_1f19edfd25804fe5ad1a3f59105df035.title: unit2ii

child_d4b875c04fee4128844092929be41e3e.content: What are the top challenges for multi-channel retailers?
child_d4b875c04fee4128844092929be41e3e.title: unit2ii

child_dcb1eb0b013c4b59858df431b1c6f3ff.content:
Can you think of other 
industry segments that face similar problems?
child_dcb1eb0b013c4b59858df431b1c6f3ff.title: unit2ii

child_abc133aca07344ed84eda4d8edb496da.content:
What are the sources of data that retailers such as Cabela’s use for their data mining 
projects?
child_abc133aca07344ed84eda4d8edb496da.title: unit2ii

child_b08dad99bee14bb78ae3cda146c63893.content: What does it mean to have a “single view of the customer”?
child_b08dad99bee14bb78ae3cda146c63893.title: unit2ii

child_4a17cc0ff45b47d38b6a97fba091c87e.content: What type of analytics help did Cabela’s get from their efforts?
child_4a17cc0ff45b47d38b6a97fba091c87e.title: unit2ii

child_fdef083c3bbb4675a1e26a6f78c91059.content:
Can you think of any 
other potential benefits of analytics for large-scale retailers like Cabela’s?
child_fdef083c3bbb4675a1e26a6f78c91059.title: unit2ii

child_cb56f8a51963430a84bbab05335a116b.content:
What was the reason for Cabela’s to bring together SAS and Teradata, the two 
leading vendors in the analytics marketplace?
child_cb56f8a51963430a84bbab05335a116b.title: unit2ii

child_641f52e4419845eb95b0a9555d42ed0e.content: What is in-database analytics, and why would you need it?
child_641f52e4419845eb95b0a9555d42ed0e.title: unit2ii

child_d6100266462d4f0ea714337f2b996f9c.content:
What We can Learn frOm this vignette
The retail industry is among the most challenging because of the change that they have 
to
child_d6100266462d4f0ea714337f2b996f9c.title: unit2ii

child_a52ceb03069048d88dc992ae8f04d30c.content:
vignette
The retail industry is among the most challenging because of the change that they have 
to deal with constantly.
child_a52ceb03069048d88dc992ae8f04d30c.title: unit2ii

child_5b7b884175e6431f8e2e3b400912d37c.content:
Understanding customer needs and wants, likes and dislikes, is 
an ongoing challenge.
child_5b7b884175e6431f8e2e3b400912d37c.title: unit2ii

child_6111ed89dc1041ca9c6f27e050e74c57.content:
Ones who are able to create an intimate relationship through a 
“holistic view of the customer” will be the beneficiaries of this seemingly chaotic environ-
ment.
child_6111ed89dc1041ca9c6f27e050e74c57.title: unit2ii

child_fedc7ef9c9044c86be044e142e83a202.content:
In the midst of these challenges, what works in favor of these retailers is the avail-
ability of the technologies to collect and analyze data about their customers.
child_fedc7ef9c9044c86be044e142e83a202.title: unit2ii

child_89920d9d006444f4a9e9099b9e012c5d.content:
Applying 
advanced analytics tools (i.e., knowledge discovery techniques) to these data sources 
provides them with the insight that they need for better decision making.
child_89920d9d006444f4a9e9099b9e012c5d.title: unit2ii

child_3357da65cc394fab820810bc91c6b7f9.content:
Therefore, the 
retail industry has become one of the leading users of the new face of analytics.
child_3357da65cc394fab820810bc91c6b7f9.title: unit2ii

child_742db30946144bbeb9e3fe1f01d3f47a.content:
Data 
mining is the prime candidate for better management of this data-rich, knowledge-poor 
business environment.
child_742db30946144bbeb9e3fe1f01d3f47a.title: unit2ii

child_49e6041428eb4d378c19f680ae90bb68.content:
The study described in the opening vignette clearly illustrates the 
power of
child_49e6041428eb4d378c19f680ae90bb68.title: unit2ii

child_4c970b272bbb4e97b3f34f6e1e5ab0c3.content:
The study described in the opening vignette clearly illustrates the 
power of analytics and data mining to create a holistic view of the customer for better 
customer relationship management.
child_4c970b272bbb4e97b3f34f6e1e5ab0c3.title: unit2ii

child_777f81868f8f4e30920335bea86f71fc.content:
In this chapter, you will see a wide variety of data 
mining applications solving complex problems in a variety of industries where the data is 
used to leverage competitive business advantage.
child_777f81868f8f4e30920335bea86f71fc.title: unit2ii

child_d597a5b41069433b91d044e3f8b8bf43.content:
Sources: SAS, Customer Case Studies, sas.com/success/cabelas.html; and Retail Information Systems  
News, April 3, 2012, http://risnews.edgl.com/retail-best-practices/Why-cabela-s-has-emerged-as-the-
top-Omni-channel-retailer79470.
child_d597a5b41069433b91d044e3f8b8bf43.title: unit2ii

child_845c4704fdb44c698618e57362f50039.content:
4.2 Data Mining ConCepts anD appliCations
In an interview with Computerworld magazine in January 1999, Dr. Arno Penzias (Nobel 
laureate and former chief scientist of Bell Labs) identified data mining from  organizational 
databases as a key application for corporations of the near future.
child_845c4704fdb44c698618e57362f50039.title: unit2ii

child_4009f89ba59f4f3db2f3e37d5121b369.content:
In response to 
Computerworld’s age-old question of “What will be the
child_4009f89ba59f4f3db2f3e37d5121b369.title: unit2ii

child_6976142f810543f79a80b317f50ffe95.content:
In response to 
Computerworld’s age-old question of “What will be the killer applications in the corpo -
ration?” Dr. Penzias replied: “Data mining.” He then added, “Data mining will become 
much more important and companies will throw away nothing about their customers 
because it will be so valuable.
child_6976142f810543f79a80b317f50ffe95.title: unit2ii

child_4682e80f629e41bca093cbd7eaf72369.content:
If you’re not doing this, you’re out of business.” Similarly, 
in an article in Harvard Business Review, Thomas Davenport (2006) argued that the  latest 
 strategic weapon for companies is analytical decision making, providing examples of 
 companies such as Amazon.com, Capital One, Marriott International, and others that have 
used analytics to better understand their customers and optimize their extended supply 
chains to maximize their returns on investment while providing the best customer service.
child_4682e80f629e41bca093cbd7eaf72369.title: unit2ii

child_70c603879fc64e65b70759fcb404bfac.content:
M04_SHAR4877_03_PIE_C04.indd   172 1/23/14   10:01 AM	 Chapter	4	 •	 Data	Mining 173
This level of success is highly dependent on a company understanding i
child_70c603879fc64e65b70759fcb404bfac.title: unit2ii

child_597dd08daa0c4f02a77c85498872b061.content:
Chapter	4	 •	 Data	Mining 173
This level of success is highly dependent on a company understanding its customers, 
vendors, business processes, and the extended supply chain very well.
child_597dd08daa0c4f02a77c85498872b061.title: unit2ii

child_66c105ac8f0e454eac5c73dde31b0470.content:
A large portion of “understanding the customer” can come from analyzing the vast 
amount of data that a company collects.
child_66c105ac8f0e454eac5c73dde31b0470.title: unit2ii

child_27c2df685b204201a04d7dffcb2b4beb.content:
The cost of storing and processing data has decreased 
dramatically in the recent past, and, as a result, the amount of data stored in electronic form 
has grown at an explosive rate.
child_27c2df685b204201a04d7dffcb2b4beb.title: unit2ii

child_648425b80f2e42a3aa17fb586bb3f9e1.content:
With the creation of large databases, the  possibility of ana-
lyzing the data stored in them has emerged.
child_648425b80f2e42a3aa17fb586bb3f9e1.title: unit2ii

child_d16b540ef3c94a4eb548406fdbf5bfc4.content:
The term data mining was originally used to 
describe the process through which previously unknown patterns in data were discovered.
child_d16b540ef3c94a4eb548406fdbf5bfc4.title: unit2ii

child_3de3953c20894961b2a53b7789b19a78.content:
This definition has since been stretched beyond those limits by some software vendors to 
include most forms of data analysis in order to increase sales with the popularity of the data 
mining label.
child_3de3953c20894961b2a53b7789b19a78.title: unit2ii

child_5e45f50ba1814435948de82c68132f42.content: In this chapter, we accept the original definition of data mining.
child_5e45f50ba1814435948de82c68132f42.title: unit2ii

child_579125e73f6b4275a37c9d8c93cd99c4.content:
rity of the data 
mining label.
child_579125e73f6b4275a37c9d8c93cd99c4.title: unit2ii

child_d1c11b2733094577bcc1983654e03a57.content: In this chapter, we accept the original definition of data mining.
child_d1c11b2733094577bcc1983654e03a57.title: unit2ii

child_fe20f7eafb8740fe8e8a97176c2bd41b.content: Although the term data mining is relatively new, the ideas behind it are not.
child_fe20f7eafb8740fe8e8a97176c2bd41b.title: unit2ii

child_1a6c5547c30b4069b9cb269367204286.content:
Many 
of the techniques used in data mining have their roots in traditional statistical analysis 
and artificial intelligence work done since the early part of the 1980s.
child_1a6c5547c30b4069b9cb269367204286.title: unit2ii

child_25c250d3101d46eca3ca9399b58d443d.content:
Why, then, has it 
suddenly gained the attention of the business world?
child_25c250d3101d46eca3ca9399b58d443d.title: unit2ii

child_11eab336fcd44bfdbb73a789d8d00f4c.content:
Following are some of most pro -
nounced reasons:
•	More	intense	competition	at	the	global	scale	driven	by	customers’	ever-changing	
needs and wants in an increasingly saturated marketplace.
child_11eab336fcd44bfdbb73a789d8d00f4c.title: unit2ii

child_96137258fd9a4af2bdc0c29ce7c70458.content: •	General	recognition	of	the	untapped	value	hidden	in	large	data	sources.
child_96137258fd9a4af2bdc0c29ce7c70458.title: unit2ii

child_8aa0bda3318d4a87a2958dadfe66e718.content:
•	Consolidation	and	integration	of	database	records,	which	enables	a	single	view	of	
customers, vendors, transactions, etc.
child_8aa0bda3318d4a87a2958dadfe66e718.title: unit2ii

child_1977f1c939484e99aee232fbbf079ff9.content:
•	Consolidation	of	databases	and	other	data	repositories	into	a	single	location	in	the	
form of a data warehouse.
child_1977f1c939484e99aee232fbbf079ff9.title: unit2ii

child_30092c411ec74b0eae673019fd3ef6cf.content: •	The	exponential	increase	in	data	processing	and	storage	technologies.
child_30092c411ec74b0eae673019fd3ef6cf.title: unit2ii

child_a9443b82b3ae4a6ca55ed982c1962d50.content: •	The	exponential	increase	in	data	processing	and	storage	technologies.
child_a9443b82b3ae4a6ca55ed982c1962d50.title: unit2ii

child_8c0d7ee32620414a91b584dc84a57351.content:
•	Significant	 reduction	 in	 the	 cost	 of	 hardware	 and	 software	 for	 data	 storage	 and	
processing.
child_8c0d7ee32620414a91b584dc84a57351.title: unit2ii

child_24f052b2678945dfb02be94b063cbc02.content:
•	Movement	toward	the	de-massification	(conversion	of	information	resources	into	
nonphysical form) of business practices.
child_24f052b2678945dfb02be94b063cbc02.title: unit2ii

child_6f7c5f7746b5459f9882e9ecf5c5d0a8.content: Data generated by the Internet is increasing rapidly in both volume and complexity.
child_6f7c5f7746b5459f9882e9ecf5c5d0a8.title: unit2ii

child_0ed5ac69c3a143028dd2884672bd393c.content: Large amounts of genomic data are being generated and accumulated all over the world.
child_0ed5ac69c3a143028dd2884672bd393c.title: unit2ii

child_58399a5b0e274a59bc9941d59fdd8e2c.content:
Disciplines such as astronomy and nuclear physics create huge quantities of data on a 
regular basis.
child_58399a5b0e274a59bc9941d59fdd8e2c.title: unit2ii

child_7211ba94bd8f4f94a3c431dfe38d7c39.content:
Medical and pharmaceutical researchers constantly generate and store data 
that can then be used in data mining applications to identify better ways to accurately 
diagnose and treat illnesses and to discover new and improved drugs.
child_7211ba94bd8f4f94a3c431dfe38d7c39.title: unit2ii

child_fc6cc3b913df47d2a3f8117b028004ad.content:
On the commercial side, perhaps the most common use of data mining has been in the 
finance, retail, and healthcare sectors.
child_fc6cc3b913df47d2a3f8117b028004ad.title: unit2ii

child_38653e75f8a74f709da3861b19fe54f7.content: Data mining is used to detect and reduce fr
child_38653e75f8a74f709da3861b19fe54f7.title: unit2ii

child_fccd0de10efe4c11b4f6bb0a551cbd1d.content:
as been in the 
finance, retail, and healthcare sectors.
child_fccd0de10efe4c11b4f6bb0a551cbd1d.title: unit2ii

child_5923c7bfe47647bea28897018e5297e2.content:
Data mining is used to detect and reduce fraudulent 
activities, especially in insurance claims and credit card use (Chan et al., 1999); to  identify 
customer buying patterns (Hoffman, 1999); to reclaim profitable customers (Hoffman, 1998); 
to identify trading rules from historical data; and to aid in increased profitability using 
 market-basket analysis.
child_5923c7bfe47647bea28897018e5297e2.title: unit2ii

child_1f32a7eb87df42e1b7621386fb6781da.content:
Data mining is already widely used to  better  target clients, and with 
the widespread development of e-commerce, this can only become more imperative with 
time.
child_1f32a7eb87df42e1b7621386fb6781da.title: unit2ii

child_600d3f44c3ea4bdd97db003792cd8156.content:
See Application Case 4.1 for information on how Infinity P&C has used predictive 
analytics and data mining to improve customer service, combat fraud, and increase profit.
child_600d3f44c3ea4bdd97db003792cd8156.title: unit2ii

child_b97bece6a3bb46d49d822f7cf0a28a85.content:
Definitions, Characteristics, and Benefits
Simply defined, data mining is a term used to describe discovering or “mining” knowl -
edge from large amounts of data.
child_b97bece6a3bb46d49d822f7cf0a28a85.title: unit2ii

child_363b7ccb2677466da6e3dbc56a8474ed.content:
When considered by analogy, one can easily realize 
that the term data mining is a
child_363b7ccb2677466da6e3dbc56a8474ed.title: unit2ii

child_7fc5045ba21548aabea47de6042908fe.content:
When considered by analogy, one can easily realize 
that the term data mining is a misnomer; that is, mining of gold from within rocks or 
dirt is referred to as “gold” mining rather than “rock” or “dirt” mining.
child_7fc5045ba21548aabea47de6042908fe.title: unit2ii

child_71a86dc97d684b51aa1a6f3107f9e5dc.content:
Therefore, data 
 mining perhaps should have been named “knowledge mining” or “knowledge  discovery.” 
M04_SHAR4877_03_PIE_C04.indd   173 1/23/14   10:01 AM174	 Chapter 	4	 •	 Data	Mining
Application Case 4.1
Smarter Insurance: Infinity P&C Improves Customer Service and Combats Fraud  
with Predictive Analytics
Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation, a provider 
of nonstandard personal automobile insurance with 
an emphasis on higher-risk drivers, depends on its 
ability to identify fraudulent claims for sustained 
profitability.
child_71a86dc97d684b51aa1a6f3107f9e5dc.title: unit2ii

child_60e1b8dce2104812a0fea072ad678b29.content:
As a result of implementing analytics 
tools (from IBM SPSS), Infinity P&C has doubled the 
accuracy of its fraud identification, contributing to a 
return on investment of 403 percent per a Nucleus 
Research study.
child_60e1b8dce2104812a0fea072ad678b29.title: unit2ii

child_0bfb66e9e8e84c939f1f96caabf836c4.content:
ntributing to a 
return on investment of 403 percent per a Nucleus 
Research study.
child_0bfb66e9e8e84c939f1f96caabf836c4.title: unit2ii

child_df0d249d85a64630ac04ddaade6b7386.content:
And the benefits don’t stop there: 
According to Bill Dibble, senior vice president in 
Claims Operations at Infinity P&C, the use of pre -
dictive analytics in serving the company’s legitimate 
claimants is of equal or even greater importance.
child_df0d249d85a64630ac04ddaade6b7386.title: unit2ii

child_4e491cba49b04e9eb0da75cef1ee6130.content:
Low-hanging fruit
Initially, Dibble focused the power of predictive ana-
lytics (i.e., data mining) to assist the company’s Special 
Investigative Unit (SIU).
child_4e491cba49b04e9eb0da75cef1ee6130.title: unit2ii

child_9d76053aa7dc40c4a452ca37334291cc.content:
“In the early days of SIU, 
adjusters would use laminated cards with ‘red flags’ to 
indicate potential fraud.
child_9d76053aa7dc40c4a452ca37334291cc.title: unit2ii

child_f6581289e0af413bb32171c3a399a6a0.content:
Taking those ‘red flags’ and 
developing rules seemed like an area of low-hanging 
fruit where we could quickly demonstrate the benefit 
of our investment in predictive analytics.”
Dibble then leveraged a successful approach 
from another part of the business.
child_f6581289e0af413bb32171c3a399a6a0.title: unit2ii

child_79dc1d84fbf54ed7842bd2bed8044b31.content:
“We recognized 
how important credit was in the underwriting arena, 
and I thought, ‘Let’s score our claims in the same 
way, to give us an
child_79dc1d84fbf54ed7842bd2bed8044b31.title: unit2ii

child_8aef5fe988ab40bcb720fa2d65fef869.content:
in the underwriting arena, 
and I thought, ‘Let’s score our claims in the same 
way, to give us an indicator of potential fraud.’ The 
larger the number we attach to a case, the more apt 
we are to have a fraud situation.
child_8aef5fe988ab40bcb720fa2d65fef869.title: unit2ii

child_8bb699bd67244fd6801aeb674f96827b.content:
Lower number, get 
the claim paid.” Dibble notes that fraud represents 
a $20 billion exposure to the insurance industry and 
in certain venues could be an element in around 
40 percent of claims.
child_8bb699bd67244fd6801aeb674f96827b.title: unit2ii

child_8cb211cfb61a4086987f7aaa0115ede3.content:
“A key benefit of the IBM SPSS 
system is its ability to continually analyze and score 
these claims, which helps ensure that we get the 
claim to the right adjuster at the right time,” he says.
child_8cb211cfb61a4086987f7aaa0115ede3.title: unit2ii

child_3ae2c6a527b34c51bf30092d6d161358.content:
Adds Tony Smarrelli, vice president of National 
Operations: “Industry reports estimate one out of five 
claims is pure fraud—either opportunity fraud, where 
someone exaggerates an injury or vehicle damage, or 
the hard-core criminal rings that work with unethi -
cal clinics and attorneys.
child_3ae2c6a527b34c51bf30092d6d161358.title: unit2ii

child_ab55a3dc8c6a4a78bd09d493ed136db2.content:
Rather than putting all five 
customers through an investigatory process, SPSS 
helps us ‘fas
child_ab55a3dc8c6a4a78bd09d493ed136db2.title: unit2ii

child_5efc81c59d374a87a12d9795af2fbcc1.content:
Rather than putting all five 
customers through an investigatory process, SPSS 
helps us ‘fast-track’ four of them and close their cases 
within a matter of days.
child_5efc81c59d374a87a12d9795af2fbcc1.title: unit2ii

child_2d4cb9bcd1f747c2bdb92526de33c021.content:
This results in much happier 
customers, contributes to a more efficient workflow 
with improved cycle times, and improves retention 
due to an overall better claims experience.”
an unexpected benefit
Dibble saw subrogation, the process of collecting 
damages from the at-fault driver’s insurance com -
pany, as another piece of low-hanging fruit—and he 
was right.
child_2d4cb9bcd1f747c2bdb92526de33c021.title: unit2ii

child_7ba93621b4bd41d9ad8cb6b88f1999f5.content:
In the first month of using SPSS, Infinity 
P&C saw record recovery on paid collision claims, 
adding about $1 million directly to the company’s 
bottom line and virtually eliminating the third-party 
collection fees of more than $70,000 per month 
that the company was used to paying.
child_7ba93621b4bd41d9ad8cb6b88f1999f5.title: unit2ii

child_c0353b0ed63643da89a787300de64a25.content:
What’s more, 
each of the following 4 or 5 months was even better 
than the previous one.
child_c0353b0ed63643da89a787300de64a25.title: unit2ii

child_ac97c233082848628ea1ffb986b196dd.content:
“I never thought we would 
recover the money that we’ve recovered with SPSS 
in the subr
child_ac97c233082848628ea1ffb986b196dd.title: unit2ii

child_8caae997fb8c4116b2b7acda50f5cc6e.content:
“I never thought we would 
recover the money that we’ve recovered with SPSS 
in the subrogation area,” he says.
child_8caae997fb8c4116b2b7acda50f5cc6e.title: unit2ii

child_f6b5c1cc50bc4f63966e8716f14595c9.content:
“That was a real 
surprise to us.
child_f6b5c1cc50bc4f63966e8716f14595c9.title: unit2ii

child_114a3a12cea742209fa2a8f76cafbb30.content:
It brought a lot of attention to SPSS 
within the company, and to the value of predictive 
analytics in general.”
The rules-based IBM SPSS solution is well 
suited to Infinity P&C’s business.
child_114a3a12cea742209fa2a8f76cafbb30.title: unit2ii

child_37f428cdeaed455496555fb4c10e45c3.content:
For example, in 
states that have no-fault benefits, an insurance com-
pany can recover commercial vehicles or vehicles 
over a certain gross vehicle weight.
child_37f428cdeaed455496555fb4c10e45c3.title: unit2ii

child_b690b282291f45e19f44c3b61200c489.content:
“We can put a 
rule in IBM SPSS that if medical expenses are paid 
on a claim involving this type of vehicle, it is imme-
diately referred to the subrogation department,” 
explains Dibble.
child_b690b282291f45e19f44c3b61200c489.title: unit2ii

child_17fa6d4df67f4f3fa74fd7008220f4bb.content:
“This is a real-time ability that 
keeps us from missing potentially valuable subro -
gation opportunities, which used to happen a lot 
when we relied solely on adjuster intuition.”
The rules are just as important on the fraud 
investigation side.
child_17fa6d4df67f4f3fa74fd7008220f4bb.title: unit2ii

child_78fa8d814c734b2a81d33178b7623432.content:
Continues Dibble: “If we see 
an accident that happened
child_78fa8d814c734b2a81d33178b7623432.title: unit2ii

child_bb2e102496a84882b321febcb3c3a1b6.content:
important on the fraud 
investigation side.
child_bb2e102496a84882b321febcb3c3a1b6.title: unit2ii

child_758c7e76f9fc44098eb79c18d2d7729c.content:
Continues Dibble: “If we see 
an accident that happened around 1:00 a.m. and 
involved a gas-guzzling GMC Suburban, we need to 
start looking for fraud.
child_758c7e76f9fc44098eb79c18d2d7729c.title: unit2ii

child_3316cc6b8bbd43d188cd43e9dde646fc.content:
So we dig a little deeper: 
Is this guy upside-down on his loan, such that 
he owes more money than the car is worth?
child_3316cc6b8bbd43d188cd43e9dde646fc.title: unit2ii

child_ba0ec0b593e249008aca91145d9a2e75.content:
Did 
the accident happen in a remote spot, suggesting 
that it may have been staged?
child_ba0ec0b593e249008aca91145d9a2e75.title: unit2ii

child_11f22a700a9941b6a3d8d4b11debf3bf.content:
Does the individual 
move frequently or list multiple addresses?
child_11f22a700a9941b6a3d8d4b11debf3bf.title: unit2ii

child_c916429d5582404684f447d779bbe3d8.content:
As these 
 elements are added to the equation, the score keeps 
M04_SHAR4877_03_PIE_C04.indd   174 1/23/14   10:01 AM	 Chapter	4	 •	 Data	Mining 175
building, and the case is more and more likely to be 
referred to one of our SIU investigators.”
With SPSS, Infinity P&C has reduced SIU refer-
ral time from an average of 45–60 days to approxi -
mately 1–3 days, which means that investigators can 
get to work on the case before memories and stories 
start to change, rental and storage charges mount, 
and the likelihood of getting a
child_c916429d5582404684f447d779bbe3d8.title: unit2ii

child_adf56c5d08cd4fe0a944bd20ac7d8009.content:
ies and stories 
start to change, rental and storage charges mount, 
and the likelihood of getting an attorney involved 
increases.
child_adf56c5d08cd4fe0a944bd20ac7d8009.title: unit2ii

child_59e8c1a149cc4395afb6597dca743d1b.content:
The company is also creating a better 
claim for the SIU to investigate; a higher score cor -
relates to a higher probability of fraud.
child_59e8c1a149cc4395afb6597dca743d1b.title: unit2ii

child_5887652e5b3a4b24ba7f0a8cc8f17b03.content:
making us smarter
SPSS rules start to score the claim immediately 
on first notice of loss (FNOL) when the claimant 
reports the accident.
child_5887652e5b3a4b24ba7f0a8cc8f17b03.title: unit2ii

child_c230cf0c17ca48f593c2afdceb928b49.content:
“We have completely revised 
our FNOL screens to collect more data points,” says 
Dibble.
child_c230cf0c17ca48f593c2afdceb928b49.title: unit2ii

child_fb9cb6e334574fc68e6df6f50bebe579.content:
“SPSS has made us much smarter in asking 
questions.” Currently SPSS collects data mainly from 
the company’s claims and policy systems; a future 
initiative to leverage the product’s text mining capa-
bilities will make the information in claims notes 
available as well.
child_fb9cb6e334574fc68e6df6f50bebe579.title: unit2ii

child_d0641c5fbe054ef393385f30ce16ba81.content:
Having proven its value in subrogation and 
SIU, the SPSS solution is poised for expansion within 
Infinity P&C.
child_d0641c5fbe054ef393385f30ce16ba81.title: unit2ii

child_77f19285b0e8466db383cb19baacdf71.content:
“One of our key objectives moving for-
ward will be what we call ‘right scripting,’ where 
we can script the appropri
child_77f19285b0e8466db383cb19baacdf71.title: unit2ii

child_dd5ca19f870748c0aa737b74fdf34d53.content:
bjectives moving for-
ward will be what we call ‘right scripting,’ where 
we can script the appropriate questions for call cen-
ter agents based on the answers they get from the 
claimant,” says Dibble.
child_dd5ca19f870748c0aa737b74fdf34d53.title: unit2ii

child_825ea9df3acb494d89cb87def6ee01dd.content:
“We’ll also be instituting a 
process to flag claims with high litigation potential.
child_825ea9df3acb494d89cb87def6ee01dd.title: unit2ii

child_6ceb9e2f315c4948b7eca274b9cf9242.content:
By reviewing past litigation claims, we can identify 
predictive traits and handle those cases on a priority 
basis.” Decision management, customer retention, 
pricing analysis, and dashboards are also potential 
future applications of SPSS technology.
child_6ceb9e2f315c4948b7eca274b9cf9242.title: unit2ii

child_234a76a8d81144bbbed454fdf9f8c14f.content:
But at the end of the day, excellent customer 
service remains the driving force behind Infinity 
P&C’s use of predictive analytics.
child_234a76a8d81144bbbed454fdf9f8c14f.title: unit2ii

child_92fef233f9ef441a8e9c7d8790a533fa.content:
Concludes Dibble: 
“My goal is to pay the legitimate customer very 
quickly and get him on his way.
child_92fef233f9ef441a8e9c7d8790a533fa.title: unit2ii

child_401d7f4156b54406ae60f10c233f9c57.content:
People who are 
more economically challenged need their car; they 
typically don’t have a spare vehicle.
child_401d7f4156b54406ae60f10c233f9c57.title: unit2ii

child_d3976b521c6240bfbf7ee08706da8567.content:
This is the car 
they use to go back and forth to work, so I want to 
get them out and on the road without delay.
child_d3976b521c6240bfbf7ee08706da8567.title: unit2ii

child_ddab8b3522d741fdb9dcc0fe1da7834d.content:
y use to go back and forth to work, so I want to 
get them out and on the road without delay.
child_ddab8b3522d741fdb9dcc0fe1da7834d.title: unit2ii

child_0edc4738d42b4c4b8312c0a29703e7cf.content:
IBM 
SPSS makes this possible.”
Questions for Discussion
 1.
child_0edc4738d42b4c4b8312c0a29703e7cf.title: unit2ii

child_2a566ac326d74e089b08214a3431dd38.content:
How did Infinity P&C improve customer service 
with data mining?
child_2a566ac326d74e089b08214a3431dd38.title: unit2ii

child_efa5e7162ad34ef7a8a285f83adb4405.content:
What were the challenges, the proposed  solution, 
and the obtained results?
child_efa5e7162ad34ef7a8a285f83adb4405.title: unit2ii

child_438eb20975f3469a91e3496cd3ef1c23.content:
Why 
is it important to produce results as early as 
 possible in data mining studies?
child_438eb20975f3469a91e3496cd3ef1c23.title: unit2ii

child_7ed5e682676b4c91a4fa82bc28ef4e87.content:
Despite the mismatch between the term and its meaning, data mining has become the 
choice of the community.
child_7ed5e682676b4c91a4fa82bc28ef4e87.title: unit2ii

child_4f0963207bed44688c79115d8653f534.content:
Many other names that are associated with data mining include 
knowledge extraction, pattern analysis, data archaeology, information harvesting, pattern 
searching, and data dredging.
child_4f0963207bed44688c79115d8653f534.title: unit2ii

child_54c99f9b790948e387e2fa8e78820ae4.content:
Technically speaking, data mining is a process that uses statistical, mathematical, 
and artificial intelligence techniques to extract and identify useful information and subse-
quent knowledge (or
child_54c99f9b790948e387e2fa8e78820ae4.title: unit2ii

child_c243d6e2deac4075b960d1131ded7649.content:
l intelligence techniques to extract and identify useful information and subse-
quent knowledge (or patterns) from large sets of data.
child_c243d6e2deac4075b960d1131ded7649.title: unit2ii

child_ae2f312daf5e47f0b4cb8fd1d58e1c14.content:
These patterns can be in the form 
of business rules, affinities, correlations, trends, or prediction models (see Nemati and 
Barko, 2001).
child_ae2f312daf5e47f0b4cb8fd1d58e1c14.title: unit2ii

child_745db52e64e946da8b5d0621e1317765.content:
Most literature defines data mining as “the nontrivial process of identifying 
valid, novel, potentially useful, and ultimately understandable patterns in data stored in 
structured databases,” where the data are organized in records structured by categorical, 
ordinal, and continuous variables (Fayyad et al., 1996).
child_745db52e64e946da8b5d0621e1317765.title: unit2ii

child_b135046750ba4ae0a3b9483b6ab1b10a.content:
In this definition, the meanings of 
the key term are as follows:
•	Process implies that data mining comprises many iterative steps.
child_b135046750ba4ae0a3b9483b6ab1b10a.title: unit2ii

child_ef3017ee5485404e9e1e16f0ef688fd4.content:
•	Nontrivial means that some experimentation-type search or inference is involved; 
that is, it is not as straightforward as a computation of predefined quantities.
child_ef3017ee5485404e9e1e16f0ef688fd4.title: unit2ii

child_3033587cd9414b8c9255f4889e9b82b4.content:
•	Valid means that the discovered patterns should hold true on new data with 
 sufficient degree of certaint
child_3033587cd9414b8c9255f4889e9b82b4.title: unit2ii

child_829c886e298443428008313a6bfb61cc.content:
means that the discovered patterns should hold true on new data with 
 sufficient degree of certainty.
child_829c886e298443428008313a6bfb61cc.title: unit2ii

child_e657ebee0c1f49b2849a59fd237542ad.content:
M04_SHAR4877_03_PIE_C04.indd   175 1/23/14   10:01 AM176	 Chapter 	4	 •	 Data	Mining
•	Novel means that the patterns are not previously known to the user within the 
 context of the system being analyzed.
child_e657ebee0c1f49b2849a59fd237542ad.title: unit2ii

child_1fba4b97d5d94a6885ad8a116e2bd5db.content:
•	Potentially useful means that the discovered patterns should lead to some benefit to 
the user or task.
child_1fba4b97d5d94a6885ad8a116e2bd5db.title: unit2ii

child_51470b6b62fc41e591715a867840e611.content:
•	Ultimately understandable means that the pattern should make business sense that 
leads to the user saying “mmm! It makes sense; why didn’t I think of that” if not 
immediately, at least after some postprocessing.
child_51470b6b62fc41e591715a867840e611.title: unit2ii

child_a45e0b4a996c4bc0a652c0105d08809b.content:
Data mining is not a new discipline, but rather a new definition for the use of 
many disciplines.
child_a45e0b4a996c4bc0a652c0105d08809b.title: unit2ii

child_38e3b1fe1d594185abf3679b182818ca.content:
Data mining is tightly positioned at the intersection of many disciplines, 
including statistics, artificial intelligence, machine learning, management science, infor -
mation systems, and databases (see Figure 4.1).
child_38e3b1fe1d594185abf3679b182818ca.title: unit2ii

child_5725f9248e404dcf8f827e18a12d6a29.content:
Using advances in all of these disciplines, 
data mini
child_5725f9248e404dcf8f827e18a12d6a29.title: unit2ii

child_6cca5149520046ec9fc983190f1c724e.content:
Using advances in all of these disciplines, 
data mining strives to make progress in extracting useful information and knowledge 
from large databases.
child_6cca5149520046ec9fc983190f1c724e.title: unit2ii

child_62e6784ba4aa4b5da5c5877bf394da35.content:
It is an emerging field that has attracted much attention in a very 
short time.
child_62e6784ba4aa4b5da5c5877bf394da35.title: unit2ii

child_a8bff8b720624a68b171b822b5405b73.content:
The following are the major characteristics and objectives of data mining:
•	Data	are	often	buried	deep	within	very	large	databases,	which	sometimes	contain	
data from several years.
child_a8bff8b720624a68b171b822b5405b73.title: unit2ii

child_bf8785f087054f3da547faae11007da2.content:
In many cases, the data are cleansed and consolidated into 
a data warehouse.
child_bf8785f087054f3da547faae11007da2.title: unit2ii

child_000bb63c79eb49b98c87527cf0f3ed8c.content:
Data may be presented in a variety of formats (see Technology 
Insights 4.1 for a brief taxonomy if data).
child_000bb63c79eb49b98c87527cf0f3ed8c.title: unit2ii

child_a23aa76c835f4c1690002f1f19cf2217.content:
•	The	data	mining	environment	is	usually	a	client/server	architecture	or	a	Web-based	
information systems architecture.
child_a23aa76c835f4c1690002f1f19cf2217.title: unit2ii

child_6fc4260e05bb4de1b8252e03c92ddc23.content:
•	Sophisticated	 new	 tools,	 including	 advanced	 visualization	 tools,	 help	 to	 remove	
the information ore buried in corporate files or archival public records.
child_6fc4260e05bb4de1b8252e03c92ddc23.title: unit2ii

child_320e03ed9e5c420baaf95dce1f66510a.content:
Finding 
it involves massaging and synchronizing the data to get th
child_320e03ed9e5c420baaf95dce1f66510a.title: unit2ii

child_b9121d1e92524667afd3389fcef46df9.content:
Finding 
it involves massaging and synchronizing the data to get the right results.
child_b9121d1e92524667afd3389fcef46df9.title: unit2ii

child_c1f9e7c4faca4636b0dfc33ef67bf523.content:
Cutting-
edge data miners are also exploring the usefulness of soft data (i.e., unstructured 
text stored in such places as Lotus Notes databases, text files on the Internet, or 
enterprise-wide intranets).
child_c1f9e7c4faca4636b0dfc33ef67bf523.title: unit2ii

child_a6ed5a61564d4a96a6fabaaa4c376465.content:
•	The	miner	is	often	an	end	user,	empowered	by	data	drills	and	other	power	query	tools	
to ask ad hoc questions and obtain answers quickly, with little or no programming skill.
child_a6ed5a61564d4a96a6fabaaa4c376465.title: unit2ii

child_1457ba5173e9431bacc6ba524582d5e3.content:
•	Striking	it	rich	often	involves	finding	an	unexpected	result	and	requires	end	users	to	
think creatively throughout the process, including the interpretation of the findings.
child_1457ba5173e9431bacc6ba524582d5e3.title: unit2ii

child_d5c395027b964c658118d11af643aaec.content:

child_91fcfb7bf2e6432ba1f32739fe15128b.content:
M04_SHAR4877_03_PIE_C04.indd   176 1/23/14   10:01 AM	 Chapter	4	 •	 Data	Mining 177
technOLOgy insight
child_91fcfb7bf2e6432ba1f32739fe15128b.title: unit2ii

child_14120a233eeb42688cdd9d48ba20aaea.content:
_SHAR4877_03_PIE_C04.indd   176 1/23/14   10:01 AM	 Chapter	4	 •	 Data	Mining 177
technOLOgy insights 4.1 a simple taxonomy of data
Data refers to a collection of facts usually obtained as the result of experiences, observations, or 
experiments.
child_14120a233eeb42688cdd9d48ba20aaea.title: unit2ii

child_3860f38120c6465fa35fba1127e4f3d4.content:
Data may consist of numbers, letters, words, images, voice recording, and so on as 
measurements of a set of variables.
child_3860f38120c6465fa35fba1127e4f3d4.title: unit2ii

child_a7ae786d1aef412aa4de2ebc213cf30d.content:
Data are often viewed as the lowest level of abstraction from 
which information and then knowledge is derived.
child_a7ae786d1aef412aa4de2ebc213cf30d.title: unit2ii

child_b8b5f54d41914fbb848bbf75260f1819.content:
At the highest level of abstraction, one can classify data as structured and unstructured (or 
semi-structured).
child_b8b5f54d41914fbb848bbf75260f1819.title: unit2ii

child_97564d8e283e44b7b892797d6679c532.content:
Unstructured/semi-structured	data	is	composed	of	any	combination	of	textual,	
imagery,	voice,	and	Web	content.
child_97564d8e283e44b7b892797d6679c532.title: unit2ii

child_c4ff0a898e824439a86650120689d7a1.content:
Unstructured/semi-structured	data	will	be	covered	in	more	
detail in the text mining and web mining chapter.
child_c4ff0a898e824439a86650120689d7a1.title: unit2ii

child_da6d55f17bd44e028b45968cc32bdf9b.content:
Structured data is what data mining algorithms 
use and can be classified as categorical or numeric.
child_da6d55f17bd44e028b45968cc32bdf9b.title: unit2ii

child_341067eefc26442b8e92f27a8849dbe5.content:
The categorical data can be subdivided into 
nominal or ordinal data, whereas numeric d
child_341067eefc26442b8e92f27a8849dbe5.title: unit2ii

child_e06fe306767c4a82ae577c69a8aeb8f7.content:
The categorical data can be subdivided into 
nominal or ordinal data, whereas numeric data can be subdivided into interval or ratio.
child_e06fe306767c4a82ae577c69a8aeb8f7.title: unit2ii

child_5fd4d72b5c0146819703070b715dfc3b.content:
Figure 
4.2 shows a simple taxonomy of data.
child_5fd4d72b5c0146819703070b715dfc3b.title: unit2ii

child_9b0bf1374b3c4f59828481cc6f464330.content:
•	categorical data represent the labels of multiple classes used to divide a variable into 
specific groups.
child_9b0bf1374b3c4f59828481cc6f464330.title: unit2ii

child_6a61abf634ef45988cd1bed75ef7595c.content:
Examples of categorical variables include race, sex, age group, and edu -
cational level.
child_6a61abf634ef45988cd1bed75ef7595c.title: unit2ii

child_fdf029a6548f4f8a817efaee421a0ae7.content:
Although the latter two variables may also be considered in a numerical 
manner by using exact values for age and highest grade completed, it is often more 
informative to categorize such variables into a relatively small number of ordered classes.
child_fdf029a6548f4f8a817efaee421a0ae7.title: unit2ii

child_1cf106970df84cc3b11b052d326f1b63.content:
The categorical data may also be called discrete data, implying that it represents a finite 
 number of values with no continuum between them.
child_1cf106970df84cc3b11b052d326f1b63.title: unit2ii

child_8317ee4a733c4128b6938a994014491d.content:
Even if the values used for the 
 categorical (or discrete) variables are numeric, these numbers are nothing more than 
 symbols and do not imply the possibility of calculating fractional values.
child_8317ee4a733c4128b6938a994014491d.title: unit2ii

child_ac7dfb5302e54a68aa4b5ecfed3913e2.content:
n 
 symbols and do not imply the possibility of calculating fractional values.
child_ac7dfb5302e54a68aa4b5ecfed3913e2.title: unit2ii

child_231aa3ae7d4f46dfbbb86d20247355e9.content:
Data
Structured
Categorical Numerical Textual Multimedia HTML/XML
Unstructured or
Semi-structured
